text: Gallieno Ferri (21 March 1929 - 2 April 2016) was an Italian comic book artist and illustrator. In 1960, he met writer Sergio Bonelli. His partnership with Bonelli lead to the creation of the comic books Zagor and Mister No. He was born in Genoa. Ferri died on 2 April 2016 in Genoa, aged 87. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Italian comics artists Category:Illustrators Category:Artists from Genoa
title: Gallieno Ferri
